channel.title: "Zero or negative login size"
channel.description:
So I kept getting an error in my cmd saying "Zero or negative login size". The reason it was happening was because I had Windows Remote Desktop Connection opened, and after closing it I stopped getting the error. What I want to know is why would having Remote Desktop Connection opened caused problems running the server? And what exactly does it mean when it says it. And *maybe* if known how would I fix the problem so I can run Remote Desktop Connection.
Note: This might not be considered the proper place for this since I don't really need help with the problem, since I figured it out. BUT it was the best place I could think of to place this at.
